kv8.6:1.3_0: Vedanā bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.6:1.9_0: vedanāya sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.6:1.11_0: vedanāya atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.6:3.1_0: Arūpadhātuyā sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.6:3.3_0: Vedanāya sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.6:3.5_0: arūpadhātuyā atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.6:3.7_0: Vedanāya atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.6:4.1_0: Arūpino dhammā arūpadhātu, kāmadhātuyā atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.6:4.7_0: Kāmabhavena samannāgato puggalo dvīhi bhavehi samannāgato hoti—
kv8.6:5.1_2: kāmadhātuyā atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.6:5.3_0: Sāva kāmadhātu, sā rūpadhātu, sā arūpadhātūti?
kv8.6:5.5_0: sāva kāmadhātu, sā rūpadhātu, sā arūpadhātūti?
kv8.6:5.7_0: Kāmabhavena samannāgato puggalo tīhi bhavehi samannāgato hoti—
kv8.6:5.8_0: kāmabhavena ca rūpabhavena ca arūpabhavena cāti?
